alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:53PM CDT until June 26 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TALLADEGA...SOUTHWESTERN CALHOUN AND SOUTHWESTERN CLEBURNE COUNTIES... At 553 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oxford Lake to near Logan Martin Lake, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Anniston, Oxford, Talladega, Cobb Town, West End-Cobb Town, Lincoln, Riverside, Munford, Hobson City, Grant Town, Talladega Superspeedway, Honda Manufacturing Of Alabama, Anniston Regional Airport, Oxford Lake, Bynum, Talladega Municipal Airport, Mount Cheaha, Logan Martin Lake, Anniston Army Depot and Eastaboga. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
